entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border updates stroke too frequently #24123
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Xaml.Diagnostics.BindingDiagnostics warnings are displayed for setting binding to TextProperty for Entry control #24120
    Backlog
  • iOS push notification fails with NotificationHubClient in release mode #24118
  • Resolving Offset Errors in MAUI 8 Apps Post-Publisher Signing #24117

Closed

  • Initial value for the SearchHandler background color ignored on page first appearance #24100
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] First Entry gets focused when page appears #23911
  • ListView is not scrolling on iOS #23926
  • How to activate Hyper-v, in my windows feature it is not found #24097
  • resource mipmap/appicon_round (aka com.companyname.mauiapp:mipmap/appicon_round) not found #18904
  • [Windows] Converter not found #9484
    Backlog
  • [Memory leak] Critical MAUI memory leak in transient views #23537
  • Unable to Disable the Window preview in MAUI #23754
  • I am using this method ( .NET 8 ) but it display a white screen after splash screen #23743
  • Can't take photos on MacOS #23815
  • Error APPX1101: [UWP] Payload contains two or more files with the same destination path: Microsoft.Web.WebView2.Core.dll in MSAL Authentication #23884
  • .Net Maui Styles break in 17.10 of Visual Studio #23008
  • Can't install MAUI on Windows 11 #23864
  • The underlying connection was closed: Could not establish trust relationship for the SSL/TLS secure channel. #23799
  • xcode-select --install xcode-select: note: Command line tools are already installed. Use "Software Update" in System Settings or the softwareupdate command line interface to install updates #23907
  • cant build app #23876

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Fix API23 Control device tests #24128
  • Remove instances of '#if NET6_0_OR_GREATER' #24126
    area-infrastructure
  • Ensure border stroke only updates when needed #24125
    area-controls-border
  • Correct "can not" to "cannot" in messages, comments, etc. #24124
    area-xaml
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24115
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove excessive StackLayout API docs #24114
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Bump to RC.1 #23967
    9.0-rc1
  • [xaml] improve performance of `BindableProperty.TryConvert` #23685
    area-xaml, t/perf
  • [android] use cached value for `GetDisplayDensity()` #23666
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • Remove excessive Grid API comment #24037
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows][GestureManager] Unsubscribe control tap events only if they were subscribed #23976
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Testing] Added a support for the device's theme change #22508
    area-testing, community ✨

Updated

  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • NavigationBar properties not updating - fix #23076
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • [X] Dont SetBinding for values returned by OnIdiom #23272
    area-xaml
  • [Windows] Allow setting `PlatformCanvas.Antialias` #23965
    community ✨
  • Account for safearea #23729
    .NET 8 SR9
  • 2174059 MAUI hit testing ignores pages loaded by PushModalAsync #24109
  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Android] Fix ToolbarItem font color issue after changing available state. #24065
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Windows] Fix Span Foreground property #24063
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [Chore] Add Android LoadImageFromFont benchmark #24033
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for Entry SelectionLength #24064
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [iOS] Shadow for clipped visual element #23872
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Space character in Webview's Source #24002
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨
